mapper.select: SELECT m.* FROM menus m JOIN user_menu_authority uma ON m.menuid = uma.menuid WHERE uma.userid = #{userid} AND uma.can_access = TRUE ORDER BY m.parent_id, m.sort_order
SELECT * FROM menus ORDER BY parent_id, menuid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menus (parent_id, menuname, path) VALUES (#{parentId}, #{menuName}, #{path})
mapper.update: UPDATE menus SET parent_id = #{parentId}, menuname = #{menuName}, path = #{path} WHERE menuid = #{menuId}
